_a-0000e2cd-bc96-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_I18N_UT_displayLabel
_a-0000e2cd-bc96-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
cast(
  'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Text',
  with(
    local!bundleKeyParse: rule!AS_CO_I18N_UT_parseBundleKey(bundleKey: ri!bundleKey),
    local!label: if(
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(local!bundleKeyParse.bundleName),
      ri!i18nData[local!bundleKeyParse.labelKey],
      ri!i18nData[local!bundleKeyParse.bundleName][local!bundleKeyParse.labelKey]
    ),
    local!updatedLabel: rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(
      nullableValue: local!label,
      replacementValue: ri!bundleKey
    ),
    local!updatedLabelForArguments: if(
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(ri!arguments),
      local!updatedLabel,
      reduce(
        rule!AS_CO_I18N_UT_replaceArgument(input: _, index: _, arguments: ri!arguments),
        local!updatedLabel,
        enumerate(count(ri!arguments)) + 1
      )
    ),
    local!updatedLabelForArguments
  )
)

    displayvalue(_, ri!choiceValues, ri!choiceLabels, null),
    {ri!value}

  if(ri!readOnly,
    rule!AS_CO_DSP_standardReadOnlyField(
      label: ri!label,
      instructions: ri!instructions,
      value: if(isnull(ri!readOnlyValue),

            joinarray(local!displayValue, char(10))

        ri!readOnlyValue
      ),
      labelPosition: ri!labelPosition,
      helpTooltip: ri!helpTooltip,
      showWhen: if(isnull(ri!showWhen), true, ri!showWhen),
      accessibilityText: ri!accessibilityText

    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_checkboxField"(

      labelPosition: rule!AS_CO_UT_getLabelPosition(
        label: ri!label,
        labelPosition: ri!labelPosition,
        readOnly: ri!readOnly
      ),
      instructions: ri!instructions,
      helpTooltip: ri!helpTooltip,
      choiceLabels: ri!choiceLabels,
      choiceValues: ri!choiceValues,
      value: if(rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(local!displayValue),
        null,
        ri!value
      ),
      saveInto: ri!saveInto,
      showWhen: if(isnull(ri!showWhen), true, ri!showWhen),
      required: if(ri!readOnly, false, ri!required),
      /* Updated requiredMessage parameter to show default validation text*/
      requiredMessage: rule!AS_CO_UT_displayRequiredMessage(
        label: ri!label,
        requiredMessage: ri!requiredMessage
      ),
      disabled: ri!disabled,
      choiceLayout: ri!choiceLayout,
      validations: ri!validations,

      align: ri!align,
      accessibilityText: ri!accessibilityText
    )
  )
)

_a-0000ed08-d796-8000-9dda-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_UT_Filter
_a-0000ed08-d796-8000-9dda-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!fieldValuePairs: a!defaultValue(
    value: ri!fieldValuePairs,
    default: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
      items: a!flatten(ri!field),
      expression: a!map(
        field: fv!item,
        value: if(
          fv!itemCount = 1,
          ri!value,
          index(a!flatten(ri!value), fv!index, null)
        )
      )
    )
  ),
  local!matchingCriteria: a!defaultValue(
    value: ri!matchingCriteria,
    default: "ALL"
  ),
  local!matchType: a!defaultValue(value: ri!matchType, default: "EXACT"),
  local!matchIndices: if(
    a!isNullOrEmpty(a!flatten(ri!records)),
    tointeger({}),
    reduce(
      rule!AS_CO_UT_Filter_Reducer(
        matchingCriteria: local!matchingCriteria,
        previousIndices: _,
        records: a!flatten(ri!records),
        fieldValuePair: _,
        matchType: local!matchType
      ),
      a!match(
        value: local!matchingCriteria,
        equals: "ALL",
        then: enumerate(count(a!flatten(ri!records))) + 1,
        equals: "ANY",
        then: {},
        default: fn!error(
          "Invalid matchingCriteria, must be one of: ALL, ANY"
        )
      ),
      local!fieldValuePairs
    )
  ),
  local!rejectIndices: difference(
    if(
      a!isNullOrEmpty(ri!records),
      tointeger({}),
      enumerate(count(a!flatten(ri!records))) + 1
    ),
    local!matchIndices
  ),
  local!matches: cast(
    runtimetypeof(ri!records),
    index(ri!records, local!matchIndices, {})
  ),
  local!rejects: cast(
    runtimetypeof(ri!records),
    index(ri!records, local!rejectIndices, {})
  ),
  local!output: a!match(
    value: a!defaultValue(value: ri!filterType, default: "FILTER"),
    equals: "FILTER",
    then: local!matches,
    equals: "REJECT",
    then: local!rejects,
    equals: "FIRST_MATCH",
    then: index(local!matches, 1, null),
    equals: "FIRST_REJECT",
    then: index(local!rejects, 1, null),
    equals: "MATCH_COUNT",
    then: count(local!matchIndices),
    equals: "REJECT_COUNT",
    then: count(local!rejectIndices),
    equals: "MATCH_INDICES",
    then: local!matchIndices,
    equals: "REJECT_INDICES",
    then: local!rejectIndices,
    equals: "FULL_RESULT",
    then: a!map(
      matches: local!matches,
      rejects: local!rejects,
      firstMatch: index(local!matches, 1, null),
      firstReject: index(local!rejects, 1, null),
      matchCount: count(local!matchIndices),
      rejectCount: count(local!rejectIndices),
      matchIndices: local!matchIndices,
      rejectIndices: local!rejectIndices
    ),
    default: fn!error(
      "Invalid filterType, must be one of: FILTER, REJECT, FIRST_MATCH, FIRST_REJECT, MATCH_COUNT, REJECT_COUNT, MATCH_INDICES, REJECT_INDICES, FULL_RESULT"
    )
  ),
  local!output
)

_a-0000e897-ddd7-8000-9c0c-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_QE_getClauseSetClauseDetailsWithBatching
_a-0000e897-ddd7-8000-9c0c-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!relationIds: a!defaultValue(
    value: ri!relationIds,
    default: index(
      rule!AS_GAM_UT_queryEntityWithSelection(
        entity: cons!AS_GCM_ENT_CLAUSE_SET_CLAUSE,
        pagingInfo: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_pagingInfo"(startIndex: 1, batchSize: - 1),
        filters: {
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
            field: "setId",
            operator: "=",
            value: ri!setId
          ),
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
            field: "isActive",
            operator: "=",
            value: true(),
            applyWhen: ri!showInActive <> true()
          ),
          ri!additionalFilters
        },
        selectionColumns: { "relationId" },
        logicalExpression: ri!logicalExpression,
        triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
        executeWhen: and(
          ri!executeWhen,
          or(
            any(
              rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(_),
              {
                ri!additionalFilters,
                ri!logicalExpression,
                ri!aggregation
              }
            ),
            a!isNotNullOrEmpty(ri!setId),
            rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!relationIds)
          )
        )
      ).data,
      "relationId",
      {}
    )
  ),
  local!batches: rule!AS_GCM_UT_getIdentifiersInBatches(
    identifiers: local!relationIds,
    batchingSize: a!defaultValue(
      ri!batchingSize,
      cons!AS_GCM_INT_QUERY_BATCH_SIZE_TINY
    ),
    returnType: ri!returnType,
    pagingInfo: ri!pagingInfo
  ),
  local!selectionColumns: a!defaultValue(
    value: ri!selectionColumns,
    default: if(
      ri!onlyGetFieldsForWrite = true(),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_rejectNullValuesFromArray(
        array: {
          "relationId",
          "setId",
          "refClause.clauseId",
          "clauseTitle",
          "retainedClauseTitle",
          "alternateValue",
          "section",
          "refUsage.refDataId",
          "refUsage.refLabel",
          "refStatus.refDataId",
          "refAddedVia.refDataId",
          "effectiveDate",
          "validationAction",
          "retainedEffectiveDate",
          "refFormat.refDataId",
          "format.refDataId",
          "refReasonForRemoval",
          "justificationForRemoval",
          "isEditedViaEditClause",
          "isClauseUpdated",
          "isRemovedManually",
          "createdBy",
          "createdDatetime",
          "modifiedBy",
          "modifiedDatetime",
          "isActive",
          ri!selectAdditionalFieldsForWrite
        }
      ),
      {}
    )
  ),
  local!data: if(
    rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(local!relationIds),
    {},
    a!flatten(
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
        items: local!batches,
        expression: if(
          and(
            rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(input: local!selectionColumns),
            rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(value: ri!aggregation)
          ),
          rule!AS_GCM_UT_nullifyEmptyNestedCdtFields(
            cdt: rule!AS_CO_UT_cast(
              type: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GCM}AS_GCM_ClauseSet_Clause?list',
              value: rule!AS_GAM_UT_queryEntityWithSelection(
                entity: cons!AS_GCM_ENT_CLAUSE_SET_CLAUSE,
                entityType: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GCM}AS_GCM_ClauseSet_Clause',
                returnType: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_OBJECT_ARRAY,
                pagingInfo: a!defaultValue(
                  value: ri!pagingInfo,
                  default: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_pagingInfo"(
                    startIndex: 1,
                    batchSize: count(fv!item.identifiers),
                    sort: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sortInfo"(field: "relationId", ascending: true())
                  )
                ),
                filters: {
                  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
                    field: "relationId",
                    operator: "in",
                    value: tointeger(fv!item.identifiers)
                  ),
                  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
                    field: "isActive",
                    operator: "=",
                    value: true(),
                    applyWhen: ri!showInActive <> true()
                  ),
                  ri!additionalFilters
                },
                selectionColumns: local!selectionColumns,
                logicalExpression: ri!logicalExpression,
                triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
                executeWhen: and(
                  ri!executeWhen,
                  rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(input: fv!item.identifiers)
                )
              ).data
            )
          ),
          rule!AS_GCM_QE_getClauseSetClauseDetails(
            relationId: fv!item.identifiers,
            returnType: a!defaultValue(
              value: ri!returnType,
              default: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_OBJECT_ARRAY
            ),
            executeWhen: rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(input: fv!item.identifiers),
            aggregation: ri!aggregation,
            logicalExpression: ri!logicalExpression,
            additionalFilters: ri!additionalFilters,
            pagingInfo: ri!pagingInfo,
            triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
            sort: ri!sort,
            showInActive: ri!showInActive
          )
        )
      )
    )
  ),
  rule!AS_GCM_UT_formatDataBasedOnReturnType(
    data: local!data,
    pagingInfo: ri!pagingInfo,
    returnType: ri!returnType
  )
)

_a-0000e2ad-62e7-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_INP_textField
_a-0000e2ad-62e7-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
if(
  ri!readOnly,
  rule!AS_CO_DSP_standardReadOnlyField(
    label: ri!label,
    instructions: ri!instructions,
    value: ri!value,
    labelPosition: ri!labelPosition,
    helpTooltip: ri!helpTooltip,
    showWhen: ri!showWhen,
    accessibilityText: ri!accessibilityText,
    align: ri!align
  ),
  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"(
    label: ri!label,
    labelPosition: rule!AS_CO_UT_getLabelPosition(
      label: ri!label,
      labelPosition: ri!labelPosition,
      readOnly: false
    ),
    instructions: ri!instructions,
    helpTooltip: ri!helpTooltip,
    placeholder: ri!placeholder,
    value: ri!value,
    /* We are using nested saveIntos to automatically perform a trim on any value */
    /* before executing the actual saves */
    /* Saves can be nested in this format to allow for better reusability */
    saveInto: a!save(ri!saveInto, trim(save!value)),
    showWhen: ri!showWhen,
    required: if(ri!readOnly, false, ri!required),
    /* Updated requiredMessage parameter to show default validation text*/
    requiredMessage: rule!AS_CO_UT_displayRequiredMessage(
      label: ri!label,
      requiredMessage: ri!requiredMessage
    ),
    readOnly: ri!readOnly,
    disabled: ri!disabled,
    masked: ri!masked,
    validations: if(
      ri!readOnly,
      {},
      a!flatten(

_a-0000e3e6-fb42-8000-9ba5-011c48011c48_.name: AS_ADT_UT_determineAuditActionCode
_a-0000e3e6-fb42-8000-9ba5-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
choose(
  where(
    {
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!externalAction),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(index(ri!originalObject, ri!auditConfig.idField, null)),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(index(ri!newObject, ri!auditConfig.idField, null)),
      toboolean(index(ri!originalObject, "isActive", 1)) = toboolean(index(ri!newObject, "isActive", 1)),
      toboolean(index(ri!originalObject, "isActive", false)),
      toboolean(index(ri!newObject, "isActive", true))
    }
  )[1],
  ri!externalAction,
  cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_ADD,
  cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_DELETE,
  cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_MODIFY,
  cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_DEACTIVATE,
  cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_REACTIVATE
)

_a-0000eb32-2fbb-8000-9d0d-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_filterRecords
_a-0000eb32-2fbb-8000-9d0d-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!fieldValuePairs: a!defaultValue(
    ri!fieldValuePairs,
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
      items: a!flatten(ri!field),
      expression: a!map(
        field: fv!item,
        value: if(
          fv!itemCount = 1,
          ri!value,
          index(a!flatten(ri!value), fv!index, null)
        )
      )
    )
  ),
  local!matchIndices: if(
    a!isNullOrEmpty(a!flatten(ri!records)),
    tointeger({}),
    reduce(
      rule!AS_GCM_filterRecords_Reducer(
        previousIndices: _,
        records: a!flatten(ri!records),
        fieldValuePair: _
      ),
      enumerate(count(a!flatten(ri!records))) + 1,
      local!fieldValuePairs
    )
  ),
  local!rejectIndices: difference(
    if(
      a!isNullOrEmpty(ri!records),
      tointeger({}),
      enumerate(count(a!flatten(ri!records))) + 1
    ),
    local!matchIndices
  ),
  local!matches: cast(
    runtimetypeof(ri!records),
    index(ri!records, local!matchIndices, {})
  ),
  local!rejects: cast(
    runtimetypeof(ri!records),
    index(ri!records, local!rejectIndices, {})
  ),
  local!output: a!match(
    value: a!defaultValue(ri!filterType, "FILTER"),
    equals: "FILTER",
    then: local!matches,
    equals: "REJECT",
    then: local!rejects,
    equals: "FIRST_MATCH",
    then: index(local!matches, 1, null),
    equals: "FIRST_REJECT",
    then: index(local!rejects, 1, null),
    equals: "MATCH_COUNT",
    then: count(local!matchIndices),
    equals: "REJECT_COUNT",
    then: count(local!rejectIndices),
    equals: "MATCH_INDICES",
    then: local!matchIndices,
    equals: "REJECT_INDICES",
    then: local!rejectIndices,
    equals: "FULL_RESULT",
    then: a!map(
      matches: local!matches,
      rejects: local!rejects,
      firstMatch: index(local!matches, 1, null),
      firstReject: index(local!rejects, 1, null),
      matchCount: count(local!matchIndices),
      rejectCount: count(local!rejectIndices),
      matchIndices: local!matchIndices,
      rejectIndices: local!rejectIndices
    ),
    default: fn!error(
      "Invalid filterType, must be one of: FILTER, REJECT, FIRST_MATCH, FIRST_REJECT, MATCH_COUNT, REJECT_COUNT, MATCH_INDICES, REJECT_INDICES, FULL_RESULT"
    )
  ),
  local!output
)

a!localVariables(
  local!inputs: {

      name: "IN_CONTRACT_TYPES",

    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_storedProcedureInput"(

        field: "refCategory.refDataId",

      )
    ),

      )

    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_storedProcedureInput"(
      name: "IN_ESTIMATED_DOLLAR_AMOUNT",
      value: rule!AS_CO_UT_indexPath(
        cdt: ri!clauseSet,
        field: "estimatedDollarAmt",
        indexDefault: null
      )
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_storedProcedureInput"(
      name: "IN_IS_EXISTING_VEHICLE",
      value: rule!AS_CO_UT_indexPath(
        cdt: ri!clauseSet,
        field: "isExistingVehicle",
        indexDefault: false()
      )
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_storedProcedureInput"(
      name: "IN_IS_AMEND_OR_MOD",
      value: or(
        rule!AS_CO_UT_indexPath(
          cdt: ri!clauseSet,
          field: "refCategory.refDataId",
          indexDefault: null()
        ) = cons!AS_GCM_REF_ID_CATEGORY_AMENDMENT,
        rule!AS_CO_UT_indexPath(
          cdt: ri!clauseSet,
          field: "refCategory.refDataId",
          indexDefault: null()
        ) = cons!AS_GCM_REF_ID_CATEGORY_MODIFICATION
      )
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_storedProcedureInput"(

        cdt: ri!clauseSet,
        field: "pscCode",

      )
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_storedProcedureInput"(
      name: "IN_NAICS",

        cdt: ri!clauseSet,
        field: "naicsCode",

      )
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_storedProcedureInput"(
      name: "IN_CO",
      value: rule!AS_CO_UT_indexPath(
        cdt: ri!clauseSet,
        field: "contractingOfficer",
        indexDefault: null
      )
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_storedProcedureInput"(
      name: "IN_CS",
      value: rule!AS_CO_UT_indexPath(
        cdt: ri!clauseSet,
        field: "contractSpecialist",
        indexDefault: null
      )
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_storedProcedureInput"(
      name: "IN_COREP",
      value: rule!AS_CO_UT_indexPath(
        cdt: ri!clauseSet,
        field: "contractingOffcrRep",
        indexDefault: null
      )
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_storedProcedureInput"(
      name: "IN_CONTRACT_START_DATE",
      value: rule!AS_CO_UT_indexPath(
        cdt: ri!clauseSet,
        field: "contractStartDate",
        indexDefault: null
      )
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_storedProcedureInput"(
      name: "IN_CONTRACT_END_DATE",
      value: rule!AS_CO_UT_indexPath(
        cdt: ri!clauseSet,
        field: "contractEndDate",
        indexDefault: null
      )
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_storedProcedureInput"(
      name: "IN_CLAUSE_SET_TYPE",
      value: rule!AS_CO_UT_indexPath(
        cdt: ri!clauseSet,
        field: "refType.refDataId",
        indexDefault: null
      )
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_storedProcedureInput"(
      name: "IN_SET_ID",
      value: rule!AS_CO_UT_indexPath(
        cdt: ri!clauseSet,
        field: "setId",
        indexDefault: null
      )
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_storedProcedureInput"(
      name: "IN_REF_IDS",
      value: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_toJson_v1"(
        value: {
          {
            contractType: cons!AS_GCM_REF_ID_CONTRACT_TYPE_DATA,
            category: cons!AS_GCM_REF_ID_CLAUSE_SET_DATA_CONTRACT_CATEGORY,
            method: cons!AS_GCM_REF_ID_CLAUSE_SET_DATA_CONTRACT_METHOD,

            contractEndDate: cons!AS_GCM_REF_ID_CLAUSE_SET_DATA_CONTRACT_END_DATE,
            question: cons!AS_GCM_REF_ID_QUESTIONNAIRE_QUESTION_DATA,

            equals: cons!AS_GCM_REF_ID_EQUALS_OPERATOR,
            notEquals: cons!AS_GCM_REF_ID_NOT_EQUALS_OPERATOR,
            is: cons!AS_GCM_REF_ID_IS_OPERATOR,
            isNot: cons!AS_GCM_REF_ID_IS_NOT_OPERATOR,
            before: cons!AS_GCM_REF_ID_BEFORE_OPERATOR,
            after: cons!AS_GCM_REF_ID_AFTER_OPERATOR,
            between: cons!AS_GCM_REF_ID_IS_BETWEEN_OPERATOR,
            greaterThan: cons!AS_GCM_REF_ID_GREATER_THAN_OPERATOR,
            lessThan: cons!AS_GCM_REF_ID_LESS_THAN_OPERATOR,
            and: cons!AS_GCM_REF_ID_AND_OPERATOR
          }
        }
      )
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_storedProcedureInput"(
      name: "IN_EVAL_ID",
      value: rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(
        nullableValue: ri!evalId,
        replacementValue: generateuuid()
      )
    )
  },
  local!spResult: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_executeStoredProcedureForQuery"(
    dataSource: cons!AS_GCM_TXT_DATA_SOURCE,
    procedureName: cons!AS_GCM_TXT_SP_EVALUATE_RULES,
    inputs: local!inputs
  ),
  local!result: tostring(

      value: rule!AS_CO_UT_indexPath(

        field: "parameters.OUT_RULE_IDS.OUT_RULE_IDS",

        indexDefault: null()
      ),
      default: rule!AS_CO_UT_indexPath(
        cdt: local!spResult,
        field: "parameters.OUT_RULE_IDS",
        indexDefault: null()
      )
    )
  ),
  if(
    rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(local!result),
    "[0]",
    local!result
  )
)

  entity: cons!AS_GCM_ENT_CLAUSESET_CONTRACT_TYPE,

  returnType: a!defaultValue(
    value: ri!returnType,
    default: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_OBJECT_ARRAY
  ),
  executeWhen: and(
    ri!executeWhen,
    or(
      any(
        rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(_),
        {
          ri!additionalFilters,
          ri!logicalExpression,
          ri!aggregation
        }
      ),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!setId)
    )
  ),
  /* To ensure proper null checks, we'll force all queryFilter values to not be null */
  logicalExpression: ri!logicalExpression,
  pagingInfo: ri!pagingInfo,
  triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
  filters: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "setId",
      operator: "=",
      value: ri!setId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "isActive",
      operator: "=",
      value: a!defaultValue(value: ri!isActive, default: true()),
      applywhen: ri!showInactive <> true()
    ),
    ri!additionalFilters
  },
  sort: ri!sort,
  aggregation: ri!aggregation
)

_a-0000ec50-376f-8000-9d94-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_getColorBasedOnColorName
_a-0000ec50-376f-8000-9d94-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!match(
  value: ri!colorName,
  /* White Colors */
  equals: "WHITE",
  then: cons!AS_GCM_HEX_CODE_WHITE,
  equals: "WHITE_2",
  then: cons!AS_GCM_HEX_CODE_WHITE_2,
  /* Gray Colors */
  equals: "GRAY_0",
  then: cons!AS_GCM_HEX_CODE_GRAY_0,
  equals: "GRAY_1",
  then: "#EDEDF2",
  equals: "GRAY_2",
  then: "#DCDCE5",
  equals: "GRAY_3",
  then: cons!AS_GCM_HEX_CODE_GRAY_3,
  equals: "GRAY_4",
  then: "#2E2E35",
  /* Orange Colors */
  equals: "ORANGE_1",
  then: "#FFEED3",
  equals: "ORANGE_2",
  then: "#FFDCA3",
  equals: "ORANGE_3",
  then: "#FAA92F",
  equals: "ORANGE_4",
  then: "#995C00",
  /* Blue Colors */
  equals: "BLUE_0",
  then: cons!AS_GCM_HEX_CODE_BLUE_0,
  equals: "BLUE_1",
  then: cons!AS_GCM_HEX_CODE_BLUE_1,
  equals: "BLUE_2",
  then: "#AFBFF8",
  equals: "BLUE_3",
  then: "#2322F0",
  equals: "BLUE_4",
  then: cons!AS_GCM_HEX_CODE_BLUE_4,
  equals: "BLUE_5",
  then: "#E9EDFC",
  equals: "BLUE_6",
  then: "#08088D",
  equals: "BLUE_7",
  then: "#DCDEF5",
  /* Green Colors  */
  equals: "GREEN_1",
  then: "#E3FBDF",
  equals: "GREEN_4",
  then: "#117C00",
  /* Teal Colors */
  equals: "TEAL_1",
  then: "#E2FAF9",
  equals: "TEAL_3",
  then: "#56ADC0",
  equals: "TEAL_4",
  then: "#2C6770",
  /* Purple Colors */
  equals: "PURPLE_1",
  then: "#F2E9FF",
  equals: "PURPLE_3",
  then: "#B561FF",
  equals: "PURPLE_4",
  then: "#790DA1",
  /* Red Colors */
  equals: "RED_4",
  then: "#9F0019",
  /* Yellow Colors */
  equals: "YELLOW_0",
  then: "#FFFCEB",
  equals: "YELLOW_1",
  then: "#FFF6C9",
  equals: "YELLOW_4",
  then: "#856C00",
  /* Appian Colors */
  equals: "APPIAN_BACKGROUND",
  then: cons!AS_GCM_HEX_CODE_APPIAN_BACKGROUND,
  equals: "ACCENT",
  then: "#2322f0",
  default: ri!colorName
)

_a-0000e63a-a5cb-8000-9bc6-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_GRD_manualClausesGrid
_a-0000e63a-a5cb-8000-9bc6-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridField_v3"(
  label: ri!label,
  labelPosition: ri!labelPosition,
  data: ri!recordData,
  columns: {
    rule!AS_GCM_UI_refClauseTitleGridColumn(
      bundle: ri!bundle,
      linkShowWhen: false,
      showTruncatedClauseTitle: true
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "",
      value: a!localVariables(
        local!usage: a!match(
          value: fv!row[recordType!AS GCM R Clause.clauseId],
          whenTrue: contains(
            tointeger(ri!requiredClauseIds),
            fv!value
          ),
          then: rule!AS_GAM_filterCdtOrRecordDataByField(
            cdtOrRecord: ri!refUsageData,
            field: recordType!AS GCM R Data.refDataId,
            value: cons!AS_GCM_REF_ID_USAGE_EXCLUDED
          ),
          whenTrue: contains(ri!applicableClauseIds, fv!value),
          then: rule!AS_GAM_filterCdtOrRecordDataByField(
            cdtOrRecord: ri!refUsageData,
            field: recordType!AS GCM R Data.refDataId,
            value: cons!AS_GCM_REF_ID_USAGE_APPLICABLE
          ),
          whenTrue: contains(ri!optionalClauseIds, fv!value),
          then: rule!AS_GAM_filterCdtOrRecordDataByField(
            cdtOrRecord: ri!refUsageData,
            field: recordType!AS GCM R Data.refDataId,
            value: cons!AS_GCM_REF_ID_USAGE_OPTIONAL
          ),
          default: null
        ),
        if(
          rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(local!usage),
          "-",
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_tagField"(
            tags: {
              #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_tagItem_v1"(
                text: left(
                  rule!AS_GAM_CO_I18N_UT_displayLabel(
                    bundle: ri!bundle,
                    bundleKey: local!usage[recordType!AS GCM R Data.refKey]
                  ),
                  1
                ),
                backgroundColor: displayvalue(
                  local!usage[recordType!AS GCM R Data.refDataId],
                  {
                    cons!AS_GCM_REF_ID_USAGE_APPLICABLE,
                    cons!AS_GCM_REF_ID_USAGE_OPTIONAL,
                    cons!AS_GCM_REF_ID_USAGE_EXCLUDED
                  },
                  {
                    cons!AS_GCM_HEX_CODE_USAGE_APPLICABLE,
                    cons!AS_GCM_HEX_CODE_USAGE_OPTIONAL,
                    "ACCENT"
                  },
                  null
                ),
                textColor: "STANDARD",
                tooltip: rule!AS_GAM_CO_I18N_UT_displayLabel(
                  bundle: ri!bundle,
                  bundleKey: local!usage[recordType!AS GCM R Data.refKey]
                )
              )
            },
            size: "STANDARD"
          )
        )
      ),
      align: "START",
      width: "AUTO",
      showWhen: ri!showUsage = true
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      value: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextDisplayField"(
        value: {
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
            text: {
              if(
                contains(
                  union(
                    ri!ruleExcludedClauseIds,
                    ri!templateExcludedClauseIds
                  ),
                  fv!row[recordType!AS GCM R Clause.clauseId]
                ),
                "Excluded",
                " "
              )
            },
            size: "SMALL",
            style: "STRONG"
          )
        },
        tooltip: a!match(
          value: rule!AS_GCM_returnExcludeTypeBasedOnOrder(
            orderMap: ri!orderMap,
            clauseId: fv!row[recordType!AS GCM R Clause.clauseId],
            ruleExcludedClauseIds: ri!ruleExcludedClauseIds,
            templateExcludedClauseIds: ri!templateExcludedClauseIds
          ),
          equals: cons!AS_GCM_TXT_CLAUSE_ADD_VIA_RULES,
          then: "Excluded by rule",
          equals: cons!AS_GCM_TXT_CLAUSE_ADD_VIA_TEMPLATE,
          then: "Excluded by template",
          default: ""
        )
      ),
      width: "NARROW",
      showWhen: ri!showExclusionColumn = true(),
      align: "CENTER"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "",
      sortField: if(
        rule!AS_CO_UT_booleanDefaultFalse(ri!isNotUcf),
        "",
        recordType!AS GCM R Clause.ucfSection.sectionLabel
      ),
      value: if(
        rule!AS_CO_UT_booleanDefaultFalse(ri!isNotUcf),
        rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(
          nullableValue: fv!row[recordType!AS GCM R Clause.additionalSections.refSection.sectionLabel],
          replacementValue: "-"
        ),
        rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(
          nullableValue: fv!row[recordType!AS GCM R Clause.ucfSection.sectionLabel],
          replacementValue: "-"
        )
      ),
      width: "NARROW"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "",
      value: rule!AS_GCM_CP_recordActionField(
        actions: #"urn:appian:record-action:v1:83b74fc4-71d0-456a-8b20-12ea04b76cd1/c50b13bd-a1b7-4d1c-ab3e-80e8e9311329",
        style: "LINKS",
        display: "ICON",
        align: "CENTER",
        identifier: fv!identifier
      ),
      align: "CENTER"
    )
  },
  rowHeader: 1,

_a-0000ec50-376f-8000-9d94-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_UT_queryRecordByIdentifier
_a-0000ec50-376f-8000-9d94-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
/*

PLEASE REFER TO THE BOTTOM OF THIS RULE FOR INSTRUCTIONS ON HOW TO USE

Please DO NOT auto-format this rule

*/
a!localVariables(
  /*Determine the castResultToType*/
  local!castResultToType: a!defaultValue(ri!castToCdtType, ri!recordType),
  /*Execute the query*/
  local!queryResult: a!refreshVariable(
    value: if(
      ri!executeWhen = false,
      null(ri!recordType),
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryRecordByIdentifier"(
        recordType: ri!recordType,
        identifier: ri!identifier,
        fields: rule!AS_CO_UT_rejectNullValuesFromArray(
          {
            ri!fields,
            index(
              ri!relatedRecordData,
              "relationship",
              null
            )
          }
        ),
        relatedRecordData: ri!relatedRecordData
      )
    ),
    refreshOnVarChange: ri!triggerRefresh,
    refreshInterval: ri!refreshInterval,
    refreshAfter: { "RECORD_ACTION" }
  ),
  rule!AS_CO_UT_cast(
    type: local!castResultToType,
    value: local!queryResult
  )
)/*

DOCUMENTATION

This rule is designed to minimize the overhead with querying data and then casting the result


Required Inputs:

1. recordType
- This is a recordtype! input of the data type to be queried against

2. identifier
- The primary key of the record type which needs to be queried

Optional Inputs:

3. executeWhen
- The query will not execute if this is false, the query will execute if this is true or null
-- This is meant to operate in a similar manner to the showWhen parameter of components
- Use this to skip execution of a query without needing to wrap if() statements around the rule
-- Examples of this would be to skip querying if your filter value is a null ID
- If the query does not execute, this will return a null value whose type is based on the returnType input

4. triggerRefresh
- By default, the query will always re-execute whenever any inputs change
- However, by updating the value of triggerRefresh, you can also trigger a re-execution even if none of the other inputs change (e.g. after a record action)

5. castToCdtType
- Any cdt type to the cast the result set. 

6. fields
- The record fields that need to be queried

7. relatedRecordData
- the relatedRecordData in which the filters and limit can be specified for each relationship

*/

_a-0000e897-ddd7-8000-9c0c-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_QNM_QR_getRuleConditionClauseDetails
_a-0000e897-ddd7-8000-9c0c-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!applyBatching: a!defaultValue(
    value: ri!applyBatching,
    default: or(
      tointeger(ri!pagingInfo.batchSize) > cons!AS_GCM_CO_INT_QUERY_RECORD_MAX_BATCH_SIZE,
      tointeger(ri!pagingInfo.batchSize) =- 1,
      rule!AS_GAM_UT_ArrayLength(ri!clauseMapIds) > cons!AS_GCM_CO_INT_QUERY_RECORD_MAX_BATCH_SIZE
    )
  ),
  local!pagingInfo: if(
    local!applyBatching,
    #"urn:appian:function:v1:a:update"(
      ri!pagingInfo,
      "batchSize",
      cons!AS_GCM_CO_INT_QUERY_RECORD_MAX_BATCH_SIZE
    ),
    ri!pagingInfo
  ),
  local!returnType: a!defaultValue(
    value: ri!returnType,
    default: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_OBJECT_ARRAY
  ),
  local!fields: rule!AS_CO_UT_rejectNullValuesFromArray(
    {
      if(
        ri!includeRelatedRecords,
        {
          recordType!AS GCM QNM T Rule Condition Clause.refClause,
          recordType!AS GCM QNM T Rule Condition Clause.refUsage
        },
        {}
      ),
      ri!fields,
      index(
        ri!relatedRecordData,
        "relationship",
        null
      )
    }
  ),
  rule!AS_GCM_UT_formatDataBasedOnReturnType(
    pagingInfo: local!pagingInfo,
    returnType: local!returnType,
    data: a!match(
      value: null,
      /*  Happy Path scenario when batching is not needed  */
      whenTrue: and(
        ri!executeWhen,
        not(local!applyBatching)
      ),
      then: rule!AS_CO_UT_queryRecord(
        recordType: recordType!AS GCM QNM T Rule Condition Clause,
        returnType: local!returnType,
        executeWhen: and(
          ri!executeWhen,
          or(
            any(
              rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(_),
              {
                ri!additionalFilters,
                ri!logicalExpression,
                ri!aggregationFields
              }
            ),
            rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!ruleIds),
            rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!clauseMapIds)
          )
        ),
        /* To ensure proper null checks, we'll force all queryFilter values to not be null */
        logicalExpression: ri!logicalExpression,
        pagingInfo: local!pagingInfo,
        sort: ri!sort,
        triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
        filters: {
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
            field: recordType!AS GCM QNM T Rule Condition Clause.clauseMapId,
            operator: "in",
            value: ri!clauseMapIds
          ),
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
            field: recordType!AS GCM QNM T Rule Condition Clause.ruleId,
            operator: "in",
            value: ri!ruleIds
          ),
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
            field: recordType!AS GCM QNM T Rule Condition Clause.isActive,
            operator: "=",
            value: true(),
            applyWhen: ri!showInActive <> true()
          ),
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
            field: recordType!AS GCM QNM T Rule Condition Clause.rule.isActive,
            operator: "=",
            value: ri!ruleIsActive
          ),
          ri!additionalFilters
        },
        fields: local!fields,
        relatedRecordData: ri!relatedRecordData,
        aggregationFields: ri!aggregationFields
      ),
      whenTrue: and(
        ri!executeWhen,
        local!applyBatching,
        rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(ri!clauseMapIds)
      ),
      then: a!localVariables(
        /*   Querying the total count to apply batching     */
        local!totalCount: rule!AS_CO_UT_queryRecord(
          recordType: recordType!AS GCM QNM T Rule Condition Clause,
          returnType: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_TOTAL_COUNT,
          executeWhen: ri!executeWhen,
          triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
          filters: {
            #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
              field: recordType!AS GCM QNM T Rule Condition Clause.ruleId,
              operator: "in",
              value: ri!ruleIds
            ),
            #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
              field: recordType!AS GCM QNM T Rule Condition Clause.isActive,
              operator: "=",
              value: true(),
              applyWhen: ri!showInActive <> true()
            ),
            #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
              field: recordType!AS GCM QNM T Rule Condition Clause.rule.isActive,
              operator: "=",
              value: ri!ruleIsActive
            ),
            ri!additionalFilters
          },
          logicalExpression: ri!logicalExpression
        ),
        if(
          local!totalCount > 0,
          a!flatten(
            #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
              items: enumerate(
                ceiling(
                  local!totalCount / local!pagingInfo.batchSize
                )
              ),
              expression: rule!AS_CO_UT_queryRecord(
                recordType: recordType!AS GCM QNM T Rule Condition Clause,
                returnType: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_DATA_SUBSET,
                executeWhen: ri!executeWhen,
                pagingInfo: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_pagingInfo"(
                  startIndex: fv!item * local!pagingInfo.batchSize + 1,
                  batchSize: local!pagingInfo.batchSize
                ),
                sort: ri!sort,
                triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
                filters: {
                  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
                    field: recordType!AS GCM QNM T Rule Condition Clause.ruleId,
                    operator: "in",
                    value: ri!ruleIds
                  ),
                  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
                    field: recordType!AS GCM QNM T Rule Condition Clause.isActive,
                    operator: "=",
                    value: true(),
                    applyWhen: ri!showInActive <> true()
                  ),
                  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
                    field: recordType!AS GCM QNM T Rule Condition Clause.rule.isActive,
                    operator: "=",
                    value: ri!ruleIsActive
                  ),
                  ri!additionalFilters
                },
                fields: local!fields,
                relatedRecordData: ri!relatedRecordData,
                castToCdtType: recordType!AS GCM QNM T Rule Condition Clause
              ).data
            )
          ),
          {}
        )
      ),
      whenTrue: and(
        ri!executeWhen,
        local!applyBatching,
        rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!clauseMapIds),
        rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(value: ri!aggregationFields)
      ),
      then: a!flatten(
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
          /*   batches       */
          items: rule!AS_GCM_UT_getIdentifiersInBatches(
            identifiers: rule!AS_CO_UT_rejectNullValuesFromArray(array: ri!clauseMapIds),
            batchingSize: cons!AS_GCM_CO_INT_QUERY_RECORD_MAX_BATCH_SIZE,
            returnType: local!returnType,
            pagingInfo: local!pagingInfo
          ),
          expression: rule!AS_CO_UT_queryRecord(
            recordType: recordType!AS GCM QNM T Rule Condition Clause,
            returnType: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_DATA_SUBSET,
            executeWhen: and(
              ri!executeWhen,
              rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(fv!item.identifiers)
            ),
            pagingInfo: local!pagingInfo,
            sort: ri!sort,
            triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
            filters: {
              #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
                field: recordType!AS GCM QNM T Rule Condition Clause.clauseMapId,
                operator: "in",
                value: tointeger(fv!item.identifiers)
              ),
              #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
                field: recordType!AS GCM QNM T Rule Condition Clause.ruleId,
                operator: "in",
                value: ri!ruleIds
              ),
              #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
                field: recordType!AS GCM QNM T Rule Condition Clause.isActive,
                operator: "=",
                value: true(),
                applyWhen: ri!showInActive <> true()
              ),
              #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
                field: recordType!AS GCM QNM T Rule Condition Clause.rule.isActive,
                operator: "=",
                value: ri!ruleIsActive
              ),
              ri!additionalFilters
            },
            fields: local!fields,
            relatedRecordData: ri!relatedRecordData,
            castToCdtType: recordType!AS GCM QNM T Rule Condition Clause
          ).data
        )
      ),
      default: {}
    )
  )
)

{

    newObjects: rule!AS_CO_UT_cast(
      value: ri!newObjects,
      type: rule!AS_CO_UT_returnArrayTypeNumber(type: ri!objectType),
      
    ),
    originalObjects: rule!AS_CO_UT_cast(
      value: ri!originalObjects,

    ),

_a-0000ec90-d194-8000-9dac-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_updateDataByModifierMaps_Reducer
_a-0000ec90-d194-8000-9dac-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
if(
  and(
    rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(
      input: index(ri!data, ri!modifierMap.field, null)
    ),
    ri!modifierMap.applyWhen
  ),
  #"urn:appian:function:v1:a:update"(
    ri!data,
    ri!modifierMap.field,
    a!match(
      value: ri!modifierMap,
      whenTrue: and(
        a!isNotNullOrEmpty(ri!modifierMap.findRegex),
        a!isNotNullOrEmpty(ri!modifierMap.find)
      ),
      then: error(
        "Only one of two parameters should have values: findRegex or find"
      ),
      whenTrue: a!isNotNullOrEmpty(ri!modifierMap.findRegex),
      then: if(
        a!isNotNullOrEmpty(ri!modifierMap.instanceNum),
        error(
          "instanceNum should be null when passing a value to findRegex"
        ),
        regexreplaceall(
          ri!modifierMap.findRegex,
          ri!data[ri!modifierMap.field],
          ri!modifierMap.replaceWith
        )
      ),
      whenTrue: a!isNotNullOrEmpty(ri!modifierMap.find),
      then: rule!AS_GCM_substituteListFromTextUsingReduce(
        text: ri!data[ri!modifierMap.field],
        find: ri!modifierMap.find,
        replaceWith: ri!modifierMap.replaceWith,
        instanceNum: ri!modifierMap.instanceNum,
        replaceAllInstances: a!defaultValue(
          value: ri!modifierMap.replaceAllInstances,
          default: a!isNullOrEmpty(ri!modifierMap.instanceNum)
        )
      ),
      default: error(
        "Alteast one of two parameters should have values: findRegex or find"
      )
    )
  ),
  ri!data
)

_a-0000ec90-d194-8000-9dac-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_updateDataByModifierMaps
_a-0000ec90-d194-8000-9dac-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
/*
The modifierMaps should have the below structure
{
a!map(
field: <The field which needs to be modified>,
find: Optional when findRegex is provided - The value to find,
findRegex: Optional when find is provided - The regex search performed to replace the value,
replaceWith: The value to replace with. When left blank the find values will be removed,
instanceNum: The instance number to which replace. Use only when the find is passed,
replaceAllInstances: Default true - Determines whether all the instances need to be replaced
applyWhen: When false this map will be skipped
),
...
}
*/
if(
  rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!modifierMaps),
  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
    items: ri!data,
    expression: reduce(
      rule!AS_GCM_updateDataByModifierMaps_Reducer(data: _, modifierMap: _),
      fv!item,
      ri!modifierMaps
    )
  ),
  ri!data
)

_a-0000e643-f7f1-8000-9bca-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_QE_getClauseSetClauseDetails
_a-0000e643-f7f1-8000-9bca-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
rule!AS_CO_UT_queryEntity(
  sort: ri!sort,
  entity: cons!AS_GCM_ENT_CLAUSE_SET_CLAUSE,
  entityType: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GCM}AS_GCM_ClauseSet_Clause',
  returnType: ri!returnType,
  executeWhen: and(
    ri!executeWhen,
    or(
      any(
        rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(_),
        {
          ri!additionalFilters,
          ri!logicalExpression,
          ri!aggregation
        }
      ),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!setId),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!relationId)
    )
  ),
  /* To ensure proper null checks, we'll force all queryFilter values to not be null */
  logicalExpression: ri!logicalExpression,
  pagingInfo: ri!pagingInfo,
  batchSize: ri!batchSize,
  triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
  filters: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "relationId",
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!relationId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "setId",
      operator: "=",
      value: ri!setId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "isActive",
      operator: "=",
      value: true,
      applywhen: ri!showInactive <> true()
    ),
    ri!additionalFilters
  },
  aggregation: ri!aggregation
)

_a-0000e67d-efac-8000-9bcd-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_queryRecordDataForClauseDetails
_a-0000e67d-efac-8000-9bcd-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_recordData"(
  recordType: recordType!AS GCM R Clause,
  filters: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryLogicalExpression"(
      operator: "AND",
      logicalExpressions: cast(
        'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}LogicalExpression',
        if(
          rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(ri!search),
          null,
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryLogicalExpression"(
            operator: "AND",
            logicalExpressions: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
              items: split(trim(ri!search), " "),
              expression: a!localVariables(
                local!searchTerm: fv!item,
                #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryLogicalExpression"(
                  operator: "OR",
                  ignoreFiltersWithEmptyValues: true,
                  filters: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
                    items: {
                      recordType!AS GCM R Clause.clauseNumber,
                      recordType!AS GCM R Clause.clauseTitle,
                      recordType!AS GCM R Clause.refType.refLabel,
                      recordType!AS GCM R Clause.refSource.refLabel,
                      recordType!AS GCM R Clause.ucfSection.sectionLabel,
                      recordType!AS GCM R Clause.effectiveDate
                    },
                    expression: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
                      field: fv!item,
                      operator: "includes",
                      value: local!searchTerm
                    )
                  )
                )
              )
            )
          )
        )
      ),
      filters: {
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
          field: recordType!AS GCM R Clause.refTypeId,
          operator: "=",
          value: ri!type,
          applywhen: rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!type)
        ),
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
          field: recordType!AS GCM R Clause.refSourceId,
          operator: "=",
          value: ri!source,
          applywhen: rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!source)
        ),
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
          field: recordType!AS GCM R Clause.isActive,
          operator: "=",
          value: true
        ),
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
          field: recordType!AS GCM R Clause.clauseId,
          operator: "in",
          value: tointeger(
            {
              a!match(
                value: ri!usage,
                equals: cons!AS_GCM_REF_ID_USAGE_APPLICABLE,
                then: ri!provideDetailsApplicableClauses,
                equals: cons!AS_GCM_REF_ID_USAGE_OPTIONAL,
                then: ri!provideDetailsOptionalClauses,
                equals: cons!AS_GCM_REF_ID_USAGE_EXCLUDED,
                then: ri!requiredClauseIds,
                default: null()
              )
            }
          ),
          applywhen: rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!usage)
        ),
        ri!additionalFilters
      }
    )
  },
  relatedRecordData: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_relatedRecordData"(
    relationship: recordType!AS GCM R Clause.additionalSections,
    filters: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: recordType!AS GCM R Clause Section Mapping.refSection.contractFormatId,
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!contractFormatIds,
      applyWhen: rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!contractFormatIds)
    )
  )
)
